sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Emergency Asthma Inhalers and Allergy Treatment for Children Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Emergency Asthma Inhalers and Allergy Treatment for Children Act.

sections.heading: Possession, self-administration, and use of epinephrine auto-injectors or inhalers at recreation camps and after-school care programs.
sections.text: Possession, self-administration, and use of epinephrine auto-injectors or inhalers at recreation camps and after-school care programs.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
